content:
# It appears that the furnace has only produced 1 stone brick so far, and it is currently showing a warning: "no ingredients to smelt." 
# This indicates that the furnace has run out of stone to process, as it only has 1 stone remaining.

# To continue production, I will need to gather more stone. 
# I will head back to the nearest stone resource and harvest additional stone.

stone_position = nearest(Resource.Stone)  # Locate the nearest stone resource again
move_to(stone_position)  # Move to the stone resource position
harvest_resource(stone_position, quantity=10)  # Collect more stone
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after harvesting stone.
